Answering WHY based on data

This document provides a summary of Datanest Analytics Catalog, highlighting the current state of data and proposing solutions for leveraging discovery analytics. It also introduces Data Science as a Service and outlines steps to follow for data science projects.

Key Concepts:

  • bridging data silos
  • leveraging discovery analytics
  • proactive business decisions
  • actionable insights
  • data science as a service
